rules_text: Discard three cards, Sacrifice Barren Summonings: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
notes: fluffy: it —> that card, Shuffle your library afterwards —> Then shuffle your library (Diabolic Tutor, also the afterwards one is obsolete lingo, http://magiccards.info/query?q=o%3A%22afterwards%22&v=card&s=edition)
